item.title: How Spotify Is Changing Our World Forever - YouTube
item.description: How Spotify Is Changing Our World Forever - YouTube Record Labels Screw Over Spotify and Small Artists Record Labels forced Spotify to completely change their business model, and move most of their free feature behind a paywall And those Record Labels get huge chunks from that payment Record Labels also have full control over the playlists, which punishes small artists Artists only get 0.

item.description: Artificial Wombs Will Change the World Although initially off-putting to some, think about [[Gender Equality]] and how it would change. We could reduce discrimination in the workplace and beyond.

item.title: Google [[Tensors]]
item.description: Google [[Tensors]] Huge [[Specialization|Specialized]] machines Google uses to do [[Machine Learning]]. They each have power equivalent as if the largest [[Supercomputer]] was doing the same test, except a fraction of the cost and resources.
